attributes.action: Discuss roles and responsibilities and accountability to the ethics committee
attributes.additional_details: So the trust and transparency of Governmnet can be seen by the public
attributes.background: For those advisors in such responsible positions to be held accountable in role not purely accountable to the specific Minister

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call for a specific action by the Government.

It's not clear what committee you are referring to, or how you want arrangements relating to special advisers to change.

We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Make appointments of special advisers subject to parliamentary approval: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/323054

Ban political Special Advisers: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/322743

You could start a new petition stating clearly what changes you want the Government to make to current rules, such as requiring an investigation into all alleged breaches of the Special Advisers Code.
